name: Demotivation
description:
TRIGGER WARNING: SUICIDE

Follow the protagonist in 7 days of his life, experiencing the boredom, the hardships and the procrastination. I would strongly suggest to push through all the 7 days of boredom, as the finale is a message I personally want to share. This game is mostly story-focused, requiring no skill of sorts but streamlined.

Made in under 72 hours for the WOWIE! Jam 3, around the theme Failure is Progress.

Enjoy <3
